header.author-notes:
Update from 0.5.0 to 0.5.1 has just 4 simple steps: 1) copy all files from the root/ file to your FTP root path and rewrite old files 2) follow edit instructions below 3) run socialnet/update_sn_0.7.0.php in your browser 4) purge the cache and refresh template and skin via ACP
Feel free to ask for support or more modules here http://phpbbsocialnetwork.com/

action-group.diy-instructions: After copying all new files to your board, doing all edits above and running installation script via update_sn_0.7.0.php, please do not forget to clear the cache and refresh your template via ACP. Then you can set up user permissions.
